treeDescription: The art of creating and improving weapons and armor from raw materials.

description.base: You've read The Armorer's Encyclopedia and know how to properly use all kinds of tools.
description.subtext: You now also understand the secondary material properties of Iron and Steel weapons.

description.base: You've read The Art of Dwarven Blacksmithing and
description.subtext: acquired the secret knowledge of how to create and improve Dwarven equipment efficiently.

description.base: Orcish equipment is  hard to craft, but you've got what it takes.
description.subtext: By studying The Almanac of Orcish Blacksmithing, you can craft and improve it easily and most efficiently.

description.base: Ebony weapons and armor - some even fail at heating the metal. But not you.
description.subtext: Now that you've studied "Harder than Steel - How to work with Ebony", you can craft and improve ebony equipment with ease.

description.base: The creation of daedric weapons and armor is a secret few mortals know - still,
description.subtext: you managed to acquire this knowledge by reading Daedric Craftsmanship...

description.base: The scales and bones of dragons are probably the hardest material to work with,
description.subtext: but you've mastered even this art since you studied The Compendium of Dragonic Armor.

description.base: You've gained quite some finesse, allowing you to craft plate armor and fine jewelry.
description.subtext: You have also found a way to melt and crush certain gems into alchemically usable dust.

description.base: You make steel sing songs on the anvil. Your hammer is no longer a mere tool, but a loom that weaves the fabric of myths.
description.subtext: You can even improve the divine artifacts of Aedra and Daedra.

description.base: After studying Arcane Craftsmanship, you've learned the
description.subtext: necessary techniques to craft bolts and arrows that will explode with elemental fury upon impact.

description.base: You've been read An Introduction to Scale Armors,
description.subtext: allowing you to craft and efficiently improve scale armor.

description.base: You've gained enough finesse to create and improve Elven armor and weapons
description.subtext: by studying the book "About Elven Craftsmanship"

description.base: Crafting and improving Glass equipment is not for the unskilled,
description.subtext: but having studied An Introduction to Malachite, you aren't one of them any more.

description.base: On your travels you have discovered the secrets to unleash the power of the
description.subtext: mystical amber and madness ore of the Shivering Isles. Few could hope to achieve such a feat without losing their mind...

description.base: You've spent some time learning to tailor and polish gems, you are able to craft a variety of clothing items.
description.subtext: Also, each article of worn clothing provides additional warmth and you can polish rough gems.

description.base: You may choose an item type: One-Handed, Two-Handed, Light Armor, Heavy Armor or Archery. Items of the chosen type can be improved 10% better at a grindstone or workbench.

If you Specialized in an armor type, your attacks ignore 15% of the armor rating of enemies wearing items of the chosen type. If you Specialized in a weapon type, you take 10% less damage from weapons of the chosen type.

treeDescription: The School of Destruction involves harnessing of fire, frost, shock and other forces that undo creation.

description.base: You've taught yourself a few Novice level spells and learned how to cast them with decreased effort
description.subtext: while your newfound knowledge also allows you to augment all Destruction spells.

description.base: By pursuing your apprenticeship in Destruction, you've gained knowledge of Apprentice level spells
description.subtext: which you now augment while casting them with less effort.

description.base: By advancing further into the school of Destruction, you've gained some Adept level spells
description.subtext: and learned how to augment and cast spells of this rank more easily.

description.base: You've unlocked almost every secret in the school of Destruction and you've acquired some Expert level spells.
description.subtext: You can now cast spells of this level easier and augment them to an almost otherworldly extent.

description.base: Your knowledge of Destruction has become all-encompassing. You taught yourself a Master level spell
description.subtext: and you can cast the most complex spells from this school with less effort while augmenting them beyond mortal limits.

description.base: Unlock the power of elemental seals. Cast Fire, Frost, and Lightning Seals at your feet,
description.subtext: each creating a deadly trap that triggers when enemies approach. All three seals can be active simultaneously.

description.base: You now are able to intensify the heat of your fire spells. Thus, they now deal increased damage.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 0.9x cost for fire spells]

description.base: Enemies are set on fire for extended duration, taking extra damage over time.
description.subtext: [extra damage over time for fire spells]

description.base: Your mastery of fire element grants you resistance to fire and increased efficiency of fire spells.
description.subtext: [+25% fire resistance, 1.05x magnitude, 0.9x cost for fire spells]

description.base: You now are able to improve your ice spells and thereby increase their effectiveness.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 0.9x cost for frost spells]

description.base: Your frost spells render targets more susceptible to frost, and freezes enemies with low resistance to frost or magic.
description.subtext: [freeze effect for frost spells, frost spells temporarily reduce target's frost resistance by 10% if not immune]

description.base: Your mastery of frost element grants you resistance to frost and increased efficiency of frost spells.
description.subtext: [+25% frost resistance, 1.05x magnitude, 0.9x cost for frost spells]

description.base: You can now energize your lightning spells more effectively, causing them to deal more damage.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 0.9x cost for shock spells]

description.base: Lightning spells deplete targets' magicka and staggers enemies with low resistance to shock or magic.
description.subtext: [Magicka damage and stagger for shock spells]

description.base: Your mastery of lightning element grants you resistance to shock and increased efficiency of lightning spells.
description.subtext: [+25% shock resistance, 1.05x magnitude, 0.9x cost for shock spells]

description.base: Dual casting a Destruction spell overcharges the effects into an even more powerful version.
By intensifying the force of most of your overcharged Destruction spells, you're now capable of staggering your foes.
description.subtext: [25% chance to stagger when dual-casted]

description.base: You now are able to improve your Arcane spells and thereby increase their effectiveness.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 0.9x cost for arcane spells]

description.base: You can imbue more magical energy to arcane spells, dealing more damage to enemies that are not resistant to magic.
description.subtext: [arcane spells do more damage to enemies with low magic resistance]

description.base: You now are able to improve your Entropic spells and thereby increase their effectiveness.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 0.9x cost for entropic spells]

description.base: Your Entropic spells drain all energy from targets, damaging Magicka and Stamina by same amount.
description.subtext: [magicka and stamina damage for entropic spells]

description.base: You can deliver powerful force with touch and nova spells, causing more damage and staggering targets.
description.subtext: [1.25x magnitude for touch and nova spells, 25% chance to stagger for damaging touch and nova spells]

description.base: You can radiate more energy with cloak spells, increasing their damage greatly.
description.subtext: [1.5x cloak spell damage]

description.base: You can more efficiently absorb energy from targets. Absorb spells are more powerful and costs less magicka.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 0.9x cost for absorb spells]

description.base: You can absorb much more health from living targets.
description.subtext: [1.25x magnitude for absorb health spells on living targets]

treeDescription: Enchanting is the arcane art of infusing matter permanently with magic energy.

description.base: You've acquired fundamental insights into how matter and magic intertwine.
description.subtext: [new enchantments are 25% stronger, craft novice level staves and scrolls, can recharge weapons]

description.base: You've learned how to tame the elements most efficiently. Thus, all elemental enchantments are stronger.
description.subtext: [new elemental enchantments are 50% stronger, you can craft runestones and create runestone enchantments]

description.base: You've become skilled in using enchantments to strengthen mind and body. Thus, all such enchantments are stronger.
description.subtext: [new attribute enchantments are 50% stronger and you can make more advanced runestone enchantments]

description.base: You've become a master of infusing enchantments that transfer knowledge and skill to the user, making all such ones stronger.
description.subtext: [new skill enchantments are 50% stronger, Ebony Smiths can permanently imbue unique enchantments onto their weapons]

description.base: You've found a way to bind even more energy into inanimate matter.
description.subtext: [new enchantments are 10% stronger, can place two enchantments with 60% strength each, craft master level staves and scrolls, 0.8x staff charge cost]

description.base: You've learned how to draw more energy from soul gems and are now able to craft them at a smelter by transmuting and melting certain minerals.
description.subtext: [+50% charge from soul gems, craft soul gems and apprentice level staves and scrolls]

description.base: Your studies have enabled you to research unique enchantments of your own and to craft better staves at the forge.
description.subtext: [new enchantments are 20% stronger, learn five new enchantments with Arcane Experimentation power, craft adept level staves and scrolls]

description.base: You could fill grimoires with your newfound knowledge that allows you to create even better enchantments and staves.
description.subtext: [new enchantments are 25% stronger, learn five new enchantments with Artificer's Insight power, craft expert level staves and scrolls]

description.base: With great skill and dedication, you get a chance to enchant an item with extraordinary strength.
description.subtext: [enchant one item with twice the strength, can place three enchantments with 50% strength each]

description.base: Your understanding of enchantments allow you to use them more effectively and efficiently.
description.subtext: [Staves and Scrolls are 10% more powerful, enchantments cost 10% less charges]

description.base: Your understanding of enchantments allow you to use them more effectively and efficiently.
description.subtext: [Staves and Scrolls are 20% more powerful, enchantments cost 20% less charges]

description.base: Your understanding of enchantments allow you to use them more effectively and efficiently.
description.subtext: [Staves and Scrolls are 30% more powerful, enchantments cost 30% less charges]

description.base: You can use your staff to empower your own spells and cast them more efficiently.
description.subtext: [While holding a staff, spells are 5% more powerful and cost 10% less magicka to cast]

description.base: You can use your staff to empower your own spells and cast them more efficiently.
description.subtext: [While holding a staff, spells are 10% more powerful and cost 20% less magicka to cast]

description.base: You have learned to use your wand's innate mystical properties to focus your thoughts.
description.subtext: [+100% magicka regeneration when holding a wand]

description.base: Grants the "Charge Tap" power. At will, drains a quarter of your current weapon charge to restore Health by 15% of the amount drained and Magicka and Stamina by 25% of the amount drained. (If you have two enchanted weapons equipped, the drain is split.)

Simultaneously (within 1 second) using an enchanted staff or wand in your left hand and striking with an enchanted weapon in your right hand releases a flash of light that staggers enemies and deals damage equal to half your Enchanting skill level.

treeDescription: The School of Restoration involves both healing and protecting spells, as well as those that undo the undead.

description.base: You've taught yourself a few Novice level spells and learned how to cast them with decreased effort
description.subtext: while your newfound knowledge also allows you to augment all Restoration spells.

description.base: By pursuing your apprenticeship in Restoration, you've gained knowledge of Apprentice level spells
description.subtext: which you now augment while casting them with less effort.

description.base: By advancing further into the school of Restoration, you've gained some Adept level spells
description.subtext: and learned how to augment and cast spells of this rank more easily.

description.base: You've unlocked almost every secret in the school of Restoration and you've acquired some Expert level spells.
description.subtext: You can now cast spells of this level easier and augment them to an almost otherworldly extent.

description.base: Your knowledge of Restoration has become all-encompassing.You taught yourself a Master level spell
description.subtext: and you can cast the most complex spells from this school with less effort while augmenting them beyond mortal limits.

description.base: You've gained more knowledge about healing spells, allowing you to heal wounds more efficiently.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 0.9x cost for healing and cure spells]

description.base: You've learned the art of weaving mystical energies into your spells, making all of them more effective against the undead and Daedra.
description.subtext: [1.1x spell magnitude, 1.2x spell duration on undead and daedra]

description.base: In addition to curing wounds, your healing spells now reinvigorate the body itself, restoring subject's stamina.
description.subtext: [healing spells restore stamina by 0.5x of healing done]

description.base: Your arcane wards now absorb magicka from incoming spells and have improved efficiency.
description.subtext: [25% ward spell absorption, 0.9x ward spell cost]

description.base: Dual casting a Restoration spell overcharges the effects into an even more powerful version.
You've learned to focus your mind. Thus, you can keep your concentration even in stressful situations and regenerate your magicka faster.
description.subtext: [+50% magicka regeneration]

description.base: Your studies of healing magic now grant you
description.subtext: the power of making yourself almost invulnerable for a short duration once a day.

description.base: Your understanding of healing and how magic and life are intertwined
description.subtext: allows you to call upon your newfound power more often.

description.base: You've honestly reflected your sins, and you truly regret what pain you have inflicted upon others.
description.subtext: All spells cost 10% less but buying/selling prices are much higher.

description.base: You now are able to improve your poison spells and thereby increase their effectiveness.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 0.9x cost for poison spells]

description.base: Your poison spells are much more potent, rendering targets more susceptible to poison and paralyzing those with low resistance to poison or magic.
description.subtext: [paralysis effect for poison spells, poison spells temporarily reduce target's poison resistance by 10% if not immune]

description.base: You now are able to improve your sun spells and thereby increase their effectiveness.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 0.9x cost for sun spells]

description.base: Your sun spells are infused with radiant energy, dealing more damage to undead and even damage the living.
description.subtext: [25% stagger chance when dual-casted, extra damage over time to undead, sun spells that only work on undead now deal half damage to living]

description.base: Turn, Purify, and Abjuration spells are stonger and more efficient.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 1.1x duration, 0.9x cost for turn spells]

description.base: Ward, Fortify, and Resist spells are stonger and more efficient.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 1.1x duration, 0.9x cost for protection spells]

description.base: You are more proficient with ward spells, using them more efficiently to block magic.
description.subtext: [Ward spells cost 50% less magicka, +10% magic resistance when holding Ward spell in hand]

treeDescription: The School of Illusion involves manipulating the mind of the enemy, as well as the dark arts not known to many.

description.base: You've taught yourself a few Novice level spells and learned how to cast them with decreased effort
description.subtext: while your newfound knowledge also allows you to augment the strength and duration of all Illusion spells.

description.base: Perceptual illusion effects such as chameleon, dampen, hallucination, invisibility, muffle, night-eye, and sound are more effective and easier to cast.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 1.1x duration, 0.9x cost for perceptual spells]

description.base: Perceptual illusion spells are improved with additional effects.
description.subtext: [improved effect for perceptual spells]

description.base: Shadow magic effects such as sanctuary, shadow drain, shadow step, shadow stride, and shadow summon are more effective and easier to cast.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 1.1x duration, 0.9x cost for shadow spells]

description.base: Delusive illusion spells are improved with additional effects.
description.subtext: [improved effect for delusive spells]

description.base: Emotional illusion effects such as calm, charm, command, fear, frenzy, and rally are more effective and easier to cast.
description.subtext: [increased success chance, 1.1x magnitude, 1.1x duration, 0.9x cost for emotional spells]

description.base: Emotional illusion spells are improved with additional effects.
description.subtext: [improved effect for emotional spells]

description.base: Delusive illusion effects such as blind, death, nightmare, noise, pain, silence, and sleep are more effective and easier to cast.
description.subtext: [increased success chance, 1.1x magnitude, 1.1x duration, 0.9x cost for delusive spells]

description.base: By pursuing your apprenticeship in Illusion, you've gained knowledge of Apprentice level spells
description.subtext: which you now augment while casting them with less effort.

description.base: By advancing further into the school of Illusion, you've gained some Adept level spells
description.subtext: and learned how to augment and cast spells of this rank more easily.

description.base: You've unlocked almost every secret in the school of Illusion and you've acquired some Expert level spells.
description.subtext: You can now cast spells of this level easier and augment them to an almost otherworldly extent.

description.base: Your knowledge of Illusion has become all-encompassing. You taught yourself a Master level spell
description.subtext: and you can cast the most complex spells from this school with less effort while augmenting them beyond mortal limits.

description.base: Dual casting an Illusion spell overcharges the effects into an even more powerful version.
Shadow illusion spells are improved with additional effects. Shadow summons last longer.
description.subtext: [improved effect for shadow spells, 1.5x duration for shadow summon spells]

description.base: Your emotional illusion spells seep deep into the targets' mind, further reducing their chance to break free.
description.subtext: [increased success chance and 1.2x duration for emotional illusion spells]

description.base: You can stack illusory image on yourself to deceive your enemies, making their attacks miss and expose their weak spots.
description.subtext: [10% chance to take no physical damage and 20% chance to ignore 50% of enemy's armor rating while perceptual illusion spells are active]

description.base: Curse your enemies with dark magic, weakening their body and soul.
description.subtext: [1.1x physical damage, spell magnitude, and spell duration on targets under delusive illusion effects]

description.base: Draw power from forces in conflict, absorbing energy from nearby enemies and creating another reflection of shadow.
description.subtext: [absorb 30% magicka regeneration from nearby enemies while shadow spells are active, +1 shadow summon limit]

treeDescription: The School of Conjuration governs both Necromancy and summoning entities from the realms of Oblivion.

description.base: You've taught yourself a few Novice level spells and learned how to cast them with decreased effort
description.subtext: while your newfound knowledge also allows you to augment all Conjuration spells.

description.base: By pursuing your apprenticeship in Conjuration, you've gained knowledge of Apprentice level spells
description.subtext: which you now augment while casting them with less effort.

description.base: By advancing further into the school of Conjuration, you've gained some Adept level spells
description.subtext: and learned how to augment and cast spells of this rank more easily.

description.base: You've unlocked almost every secret in the school of Conjuration and you've acquired some Expert level spells.
description.subtext: You can now cast spells of this level easier and augment them to an almost otherworldly extent.

description.base: Your knowledge of Conjuration has become all-encompassing. You taught yourself a Master level spell
description.subtext: and you can cast the most complex spells from this school with less effort while augmenting them beyond mortal limits.

description.base: Dual casting a Conjuration spell overcharges the spell, allowing it to last longer.
You have practiced the mental ability of maintaining two summons at the same time. This power extends to
description.subtext: controlling any type of conjured or conceived entity, even outside the school of Conjuration.

description.base: You've developed your skill for summoning undead and rasing the dead, improving their potency and duration.
description.subtext: [2x undead summon spell duration, stronger reanimated dead, 1.25x reanimate level limit, 5x reanimate spell duration]

description.base: Your knowledge of the realms of the dead surpasses that of many. You can raise stronger entities and they last much longer.
description.subtext: [3x undead summon spell duration (overwrite), 1.5x reanimate level limit (overwrite), 10x reanimate spell duration (overwrite)]

description.base: By infusing your undead creations with dark energies, you can make them stronger and prevent them from decaying to dust.
description.subtext: [stronger reanimated dead, reanimated dead can cast spells, reanimated dead do not turn into ash, 1.5x undead summon spell duration]

description.base: You've become skilled in binding daedra in shape of weapons and armors. Bound weapons and armors are stronger longer-lasting, and easier to cast.
description.subtext: [stronger bound items, 1.25x bound spell duration, 0.5x bound weapon spell cost]

description.base: You can infuse bound weapons and armors with additional effects of your choice. Bound weapons and armors are easier to cast.
description.subtext: [fire/frost/shock/mystic effect for weapons (damage), shield (cloak), and armor (resist), 0.9x bound item spell cost]

description.base: You can bind stronger or additional effects to your bound weapons and armors. Bound weapons and armors are more easier to cast and last longer.
description.subtext: [improved bound effects, 1.5x bound spell duration (overwrite), 0.8x bound item spell cost (overwrite)]

description.base: You've perfected your invocations of summoning bound weapons and armors. Your bound weapons and armors are much stronger.
description.subtext: [stronger bound items, weapon/shield/armor get increased armor penetration (20%) / damage blocked (20%) / physical damage reduction (10%)]

description.base: Having studied the barriers that divide the planes of existence, you can make your summoned daedra last longer in this realm.
description.subtext: [2x daedra summon spell duration]

description.base: You've perfected your spells' formulae to summon the daedra, maintaining them longer and can cast them further away.
description.subtext: [3x daedra summon spell duration (overwrite), 3x daedra summon spell range]

description.base: Your knowledge of Oblivion's elemental aspects increases the strength of all your summoned Atronachs. Other daedra summons last longer.
description.subtext: [stronger atronach summons, 1.5x non-atronach daedra summon spell duration]

description.base: You can call upon the ancient spirits for your aid. Summoned spirits are faster and stronger.
description.subtext: [stronger spirit summons]

description.base: You've learned to commune with the spirits, summoning them for extended duration.
description.subtext: [2x spirit summon spell duration]

description.base: You've strengthened your bond with the spirits. They can be summoned with much more ease and will last longer.
description.subtext: [3x spirit summon spell duration (overwrite), 0.9x spirit summon spell cost]

description.base: You can call upon the spirits to protect you, increasing your resistance to physical and magical attacks.
description.subtext: [+10% magic resistance and +150 armor rating while spirit summons are active]

description.base: You can violently drain remaining energy from corpses, destoying them in the process to damage nearby enemies.
description.subtext: [Siphon Corpse lesser power: absorb 50 magicka from each corpse and deal 50 magical damage to nearby enemies, half damage to non-living]

description.base: You draw dark energy from the Oblivion realm while maintaining a connection to it, boosting your magicka regeneration.
description.subtext: [+150% magicka regeneration while daedra summons are active]

description.base: Your training on Soul Magic allows you to channel more strength with higher efficiency.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 1.1x duration, 0.9x cost for necrotic and soul spells]

description.base: Your necrotic spell consumes all, burning the soul of the living and damaging even the non-living.
description.subtext: [25% stagger chance when dual-casted, extra damage over time to the living, half damage to non-living]

treeDescription: The School of Alteration involves the manipulation of the physical world and its natural properties.

description.base: You've taught yourself a few Novice level spells and learned how to cast them with decreased effort
description.subtext: while your newfound knowledge also allows you to augment all Alteration spells.

description.base: By pursuing your apprenticeship in Alteration, you've gained knowledge of Apprentice level spells
description.subtext: which you now augment while casting them with less effort.

description.base: By advancing further into the school of Alteration, you've gained some Adept level spells
description.subtext: and learned how to augment and cast spells of this rank more easily.

description.base: You've unlocked almost every secret in the school of Alteration and you've acquired some Expert level spells.
description.subtext: You can now cast spells of this level easier and augment them to an almost otherworldly extent.

description.base: Your knowledge of Alteration has become all-encompassing. You taught yourself a Master level spell
description.subtext: and you can cast the most complex spells from this school with less effort while augmenting them beyond mortal limits.

description.base: You've mastered the art of absorbing Magicka from incoming spells, and are now able to fully absorb their power from time to time.
description.subtext: [+10% magic absorb chance]

description.base: You've expanded the versatility of your Armor and Shield spells, enabling them to decrease incoming elemental and physical damage.
description.subtext: [0.8x incoming fire, frost, shock, physical damage when Armor or Shield spell is active]

description.base: You've become exceptionally good at making your alteration spells more stable. Thus, they now last longer.
description.subtext: [1.5x alteration spell duration]

description.base: Your knowledge of the very fabric of magic itself allows you to cast any spell of any school with decreased effort.
description.subtext: [0.9x spell cost for all schools of magic]

description.base: Having delved even deeper in metamagical lore, you can cast any spell more effectively and augment all other magical effects.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 1.1x duration for all schools of magic]

description.base: You've mastered the art of casting armor spells. Their effect is maximized when you don't wear any distracting armor.
description.subtext: [1.5x armor and shield spell magnitude when not wearing chest armor, 1.2x when wearing chest armor]

description.base: Dual casting an Alteration spell overcharges the effects into an even more powerful version.
You're able to block a part of a dangerous spell's effect.
description.subtext: [+10% magic resistance]

description.base: Transmutation, size-shifting, shape-shifting spells are stonger and more efficient.
description.subtext: [1.1x magnitude, 1.1x duration, 0.9x cost for transmutation spells]

description.base: Health is increased and regenerates while transmutation spell is active.
description.subtext: [+50 health and +1/s health regeneration while transmutation spell is active]

description.base: You can more easily handle telekinetic spells, increasing their power and efficiency.
description.subtext: [1.2x magnitude, 0.8x cost for telekinetic spells]

description.base: Your telekinetic spells cause devastating impact, dealing more damage and knocking off stronger targets.
description.subtext: [+25% physical telekinetic spell damage, +10% magic resistance threshold for telekinetic knockdown effect]

description.base: Wind spells are stronger and more efficient.
description.subtext: [1.2x magnitude, 1.2x duration, 0.8x cost for wind spells]

description.base: Wind spells are more devastating at exteriors, and you can summon a thunderstorm with Control Weather spell.
description.subtext: [1.33x wind spell magnitude at exteriors, can choose Storm weather with Control Weather spell]

description.base: You can cast simple spells without mastering them but with less potency.
description.subtext: [Spells up to Novice level cost 50% less magicka to cast without mastery perks]

description.base: You can cast simple spells without mastering them but with less potency. [Requires Level 10]
description.subtext: [Spells up to Apprentice level cost 50% less magicka to cast without mastery perks, +0.5% spell power for each skill level]

description.base: You can cast simple spells without mastering them but with less potency. [Requires Level 20]
description.subtext: [Spells up to Adept level cost 50% less magicka to cast without mastery perks, +1% spell power for each skill level]

description.base: You can empower your spells in cost of more Magicka to cast them. [Requires Level 10]
description.subtext: [Apply one of the three bonuses with 50% more magicka cost: 20% higher magnitude, 20% longer duration, 3x longer spell range]

description.base: Your strong willpower provides resistance to harmful magic and more stamina. [Requires Level 10]
description.subtext: [+5% magic resistance when Magic Resistance perk is not taken, +10 stamina]

description.base: Your strong willpower provides resistance to harmful magic and more stamina. [Requires Level 20]
description.subtext: [+10% magic resistance when Magic Resistance perk is not taken, +20 stamina]

description.base: Your strong willpower provides resistance to harmful magic and more stamina. [Requires Level 30]
description.subtext: [+15% magic resistance when Magic Resistance perk is not taken, +30 stamina]

treeDescription: Those who dabble in the fine art of speechcraft are able to haggle for the best prices, and to convince about anyone of anything.

description.base: You've learned how to deal with Skyrim's greedy merchants
description.subtext: Prices are better and scale 1% per speech level.

description.base: You can invest gold to permanently increase the amount of gold that merchants have,
description.subtext: merchants will buy any non-stolen item, sell price is increased by 15%.

description.base: You've become so persuasive that you could make almost anyone believe that
description.subtext: your goods are of a legal origin.

description.base: You've spent quite some time improving your rhetorical skills, intimidation is much more likely to succeed
description.subtext: and you gain 10% better prices from the opposite gender.

description.base: You've become proficient at acting, and with the right equipment you can now disguise yourself
description.subtext: as a Forsworn, Imperial, Stormcloak, Necromancer, Thalmor or Warlock to (usually) avoid detection.

description.base: There is no role you cannot play, and your acting is so believable that there is almost no way
description.subtext: for others to see through your disguises.

description.base: Your rhetorical skill makes you the perfect leader. By inspiring all those who fight by your side,
description.subtext: followers gain 20% damage, -15% spell cost, +75% block, +100 magicka and stamina, 50 carry weight.

description.base: You've been studying the lore and ancient script of dragons and the Thu'um.
description.subtext: Thus, you can shout cooldown is reduced by 10%.

description.base: You've spent time meditating on the Way of the Voice, unearthing more knowledge.
description.subtext: Grants a dragon soul at the cost of a perk point.

description.base: You have been guided in meditating on the Thu'um.
description.subtext: Now your shouts linger, lasting 15% longer than they did before.

description.base: You know what it means to be called Ysmir, Dragon of the North.
description.subtext: Enemy shout effects are reduced by 50%.

description.base: The horrors that the Thu'um can inflict are etched into your mind just as you have seen them etched into stone.
description.subtext: Your shouts have 15% greater magnitude.

description.base: You've meditated thoroughly, and acquired vast insights into the Way of the Voice.
description.subtext: Gain a daily power that lets you use your shouts more rapidly.

description.base: Your knowledge in combat tactics allow you to effectively lead your allies in combat.
description.subtext: [Improve nearby allies' skills by 10%, increase magicka, stamina, and their regeneration by 50(%), increase unarmed damage by 5]

description.base: Your knowledge in combat tactics allow you to effectively lead your allies in combat.
description.subtext: [Improve nearby allies' skills by 20%, increase magicka, stamina, and their regeneration by 100(%), increase unarmed damage by 10]

description.base: Your knowledge in combat tactics allow you to effectively lead your allies in combat.
description.subtext: [Improve nearby allies' skills by 30%, increase magicka, stamina, and their regeneration by 150(%), increase unarmed damage by 15]

description.base: Your meditate on the Thu'um for deeper understanding of the Words of Power, making them more powerful. [Requires Level 10]
description.subtext: [Shouts are 5% more powerful, shout cooldown is reduced by 10%]

description.base: Your meditate on the Thu'um for deeper understanding of the Words of Power, making them more powerful. [Requires Level 20]
description.subtext: [Shouts are 10% more powerful, shout cooldown is reduced by 20%]

description.base: Your meditate on the Thu'um for deeper understanding of the Words of Power, making them more powerful. [Requires Level 30]
description.subtext: [Shouts are 15% more powerful, shout cooldown is reduced by 30%]

description.base: Overwhelm your enemies with a roaring shout, striking fear into their hearts and sending weakner enemies fleeing.
description.subtext: [living enemies up to level 30 do 20% less damage, enemies up to level 20 flee from combat for one minute]

treeDescription: Alchemy is the art of creating magical potions, extracts and deadly poisons.

description.base: You've acquired basic alchemical insights and understand how to work with a laboratory.
description.subtext: Thus, you can now craft your own potions and poisons.

description.base: Through obscure knowledge, you now can enhance your mixtures and craft alchemistic powders at a smelter.
description.subtext: Besides, your sensory organs have become very keen. Thus, you determine all the alchemical properties of consumed ingredients.

description.base: Having refinined the brewing process,
description.subtext: your potions are now 25% stronger.

description.base: You've started experimenting with a catalyst that increases the yield of the brewing process.
You've perfected the catalyst. Thereby, you can craft double the amount of
description.subtext: mixtures with the same amount of ingredients.

description.base: You've discovered a way to make your body more resiliant to disease and poison (50% and 25% respectively)
You've found a method to eliminate disadvantages from your mixtures
description.subtext: and to make all of them even more potent.

description.base: Having altered your body with extracts from troll fat and a mammoth heart,
description.subtext: you've become more resilient to harm.

description.base: Having altered your body with extracts from a Dremora's Heart and Ectoplasm,
description.subtext: your mind has transcended mortal limits, expanding your magicka and improving your spell casting.

description.base: Having altered your body with extracts from a sabrecat eye,
description.subtext: you can now make your eyes see in the dark at will.

description.base: Having altered your body with extracts from troll fat, slaughterfish eggs and spriggan sap,
description.subtext: you're now able to regenerate your body, and do so even more rapidly when you are immersed in water.

description.base: Your experience in the obscure alchemical arts allows you to concentrate your poisons.
description.subtext: Thus, you can make most of them last longer before they need to be reapplied.

description.base: By adding small amounts of truly horrifying ingredients,
description.subtext: you are able to make your poisons more potent.

description.base: Alcohol pumps you up, boosting your strength and stamina. [Requires Level 10]
description.subtext: [Removes Alcohol Blur, regenerate 2 stamina per second and do 10% more damage with melee attacks while tipsy]

description.base: Alcohol pumps you up, boosting your strength and stamina. [Requires Level 20]
description.subtext: [Removes Alcohol Blur, regenerate 3 stamina per second and do 20% more damage with melee attacks while drunk]

description.base: You keep a healthy diet, maximizing the nutrition of foods. [Requires Level 10]
description.subtext: [Food effects are 50% stronger and longer lasting]

description.base: You can directly consume alchemical ingredients to draw their effects. [Requires Level 10]
description.subtext: [2x magnitude for ingredients consumed]

description.base: You can directly consume alchemical ingredients to draw their effects. [Requires Level 20]
description.subtext: [5x magnitude for ingredients consumed]

description.base: Your poisons are highly corrosive, enabling you to ignore 20% of the armor rating of an affected target for their duration.

When you shout, your blood turns poisonous for 15 seconds. The next time you get hit with a weapon, retaliate with a powerful poisonous strike that deals 50 points of poison damage per second for 10 seconds.

treeDescription: Sneaking is the art of moving unseen and unheard.

description.base: You know the basics of moving silently and are 30% harder to detect when sneaking
description.subtext: while not wearing any heavy armor.

description.base: You've learned to exploit weaknesses in your foes' armor
description.subtext: when sneak attacking with daggers, bows or swords.

description.base: Newfound knowledge of humanoid anatomy allows you to slay almost any human-like creature outright with sneak attacks.
description.subtext: [5x/2x sneak attack damage with melee/ranged weapons on humanoids, 2x/1.5x on targets immune to sneak attacks]

description.base: Your vast knowledge of anatomy allows you to perform devastating sneak attacks on almost any target.
description.subtext: [5x/2x sneak attack damage with melee/ranged weapons on all targets, 3x/2x on targets immune to sneak attacks]

description.base: Your newfound finesse allows you to move more quietly while not wearing any heavy armor.
By distributing your weight more consciously, you're able to move more freely while sneaking
description.subtext: and avoid triggering pressure plates or similar mechanisms.

description.base: Your improved balance allows you to silently roll forward,
description.subtext: avoid getting knocked down except through magic and move even more quietly.

description.base: There's almost nothing you cannot evade.
description.subtext: You are even harder to detect, more silent and all falling damage is decreased.

description.base: You can suppress the noise cast by your spell and deliver stronger effect to unwary targets.
description.subtext: [Spells and enchantments are silent when cast out of combat, spells are 10% more powerful on targets while undetected]

description.base: You can suppress the noise cast by your spell and deliver stronger effect to unwary targets.
description.subtext: [Spells and enchantments are silent when cast out of combat, spells are 30% more powerful on targets while undetected]

description.base: You can suppress the noise cast by your spell and deliver stronger effect to unwary targets.
description.subtext: [Spells and enchantments are silent when cast out of combat, spells are 50% more powerful on targets while undetected]

description.base: Sneak attacks deal 10% more damage for each 200 points of Health the target has, up to 50% more damage.
Sneaking is 15% more effective against targets that are in combat with you, or 30% if they are in combat with someone else.
Grants the "Tripwire" power. At will, places a tripwire in front of you for 120 seconds. It snaps when tripped, knocking all targets hit by it to the floor.
Tripwire also reduces armor rating by 250 points for 10 seconds.
Breaking invisibility with a power attack is a guaranteed critical strike that deals 50% more critical damage.

treeDescription: Seasoned Wayfarers, whether travelling alone or grouped, are proficient at opening locked doors and containers, as well as exploring and fining more treasures.

description.base: You have learned the basics of the art of picking locks and carrying found goods.
description.subtext: [+3 lockpicking expertise, +25 carry weight, forge lockpicks with Craftsmanship]

description.base: Gain 15% magic resistance and 150 armor rating when fighting alone.
Regenerate health, stamina and magicka 50% faster when you are fighting alone.
You resist 10% fire, frost and shock damage when fighting alone.
Deal 10% more damage when you are fighting alone.
You have extended your repertoire of lockpicking tricks and are able to carry more loot.
description.subtext: [+2 Lockpicking Expertise, +25 carry weight]

description.base: You are able to locate secret spaces in containers when you search them.
description.subtext: [15% chance to find special loot in select chests]

description.base: You have memorized the inner mechanics of sophisticated locks and security systems and are able to haul more loot out.
description.subtext: [+2 Lockpicking Expertise, +25 Carry Weight]

description.base: You learned everything there is to know about the art of lockpicking and hauling loot.
description.subtext: [+2 Lockpicking Expertise, +25 Carry Weight, locks never break]

description.base: Nearby allies, but not the player, gain 150 armor rating and 15% magical resistance.
Allies, but not the player, regenerate health, stamina and magicka 50% faster.
Nearby allies, but not the player, gain 10% resist to fire, frost and shock.
Deal 10% more damage when you are fighting with allies.
You have mastered the outdoors and all of Skyrim's fauna. Gain a power to tame nearby animals under 50% health.
description.subtext: Also move 10% faster outdoors.

description.base: While others would ignore the threats of the elements, you understand the danger.
description.subtext: Regenerate stamina and magicka 100% faster when outdoors and out of combat.

description.base: You've spent significant time hunting in the wilderness and can deal more damage to most animals.
description.subtext: Deal 20% more damage to all animals.

description.base: You've spent significant time hunting in the wilderness and can deal more damage to most animals.
description.subtext: Deal 40% more damage to all animals.

description.base: Activate a hostile automaton to lockpick your way into its engine. Lock difficulty is based on its current Health. Pick its lock within 15 seconds to reduce its Health to 1 and shut it down for 60 seconds. If you fail, you can't try again for 30 seconds.

Activate an automaton under Lockdown to lockpick its brain. Succeed within 15 seconds to hack the automaton, forcing it to follow you and fight for you. If you fail, you can't try again for 30 seconds. You can only have one Hotwired Automaton at a time.

Your Hotwired Automaton moves 30% faster and attacks 20% faster. Hitting your Hotwired Automaton with a mace or warhammer repairs it 150 points (or 300 points on a power attack) and further increases attack speed by 50% for 10 seconds.

treeDescription: The art of pickpocketing, taking risks and elevating your own self.

description.base: You've spent some time improving your sleight of hand,
description.subtext: which gives you substantial chances when pickpocketing.

description.base: You've been in and out of jail, where most people wither away you've used the time to reflect and train
description.subtext: Gain 5 Health, Magicka and Stamina per Jail Escapes, Up To 5 Times.

description.base: Gain carry weight, light armor rating and sneak ability per pocket picked,
description.subtext: 10 carry weight, 2% light armor rating and 3% sneak ability per 20 pockets picked, maxing out at 100.

description.base: You gain elemental resist based on how much gold you are currently carrying
description.subtext: [Up to 21% Fire/Frost/Shock Resist, (3% per 5k gold, maxed at 35k)]

description.base: Pickpocketing gold, keys, gems and jewelry is 50% easier. Pickpocketing sleeping targets is much easier.
Poisons placed in targets' pockets are 50% stronger when target is not detecting you.
Can pickpocket equipped weapons, arrows and staves.
Your legendary skill means you almost never get caught.
description.subtext: Poisons placed in pockets are 50% stronger on already poisoned targets.

description.base: You have unburdened your body. You gain 100 armor rating when not wearing armor and
description.subtext: gain 10% armor penetration and 10 unarmed damage when unarmored.

description.base: You've unburdened your inner thoughts, gaining 10% resistance to magic
description.subtext: and 50% greater health, stamina and magicka regen when unarmored.

description.base: You have unburdened your spirit and now shouts are 10% stronger and last 10% longer
description.subtext: also you are 25% more resistant to diseases and poisons when unarmored.

description.base: You can now pickup and deploy Bear Traps, and craft them yourself at the forge. Bear Traps deal extra damage based on your Finesse skill.
Traps can now be poisoned.
When deploying a trap, you can consume elemental salt to coat it. Affected enemies take minor elemental damage, and on death, summon an atronach.
Your bear traps paralyze any enemy caught in their jaws, and deal a small amount of unresistable damage.
You can now pickup and deploy Bear Traps, and craft them yourself at the forge. Bear Traps deal extra damage based on your Finesse skill.
Traps can now be poisoned.
When deploying a trap, you can consume elemental salt to coat it. Affected enemies take minor elemental damage, and on death, summon an atronach.
Your bear traps paralyze any enemy caught in their jaws, and deal a small amount of unresistable damage.
You can now pickup and deploy Bear Traps, and craft them yourself at the forge. Bear Traps deal extra damage based on your Finesse skill.
Traps can now be poisoned.
When deploying a trap, you can consume elemental salt to coat it. Affected enemies take minor elemental damage, and on death, summon an atronach.
Your bear traps paralyze any enemy caught in their jaws, and deal a small amount of unresistable damage.
You're quick thinking and even quicker with your hands
description.subtext: Can now create pocket sand at a forge and use it to impair enemies.

description.base: Your pocket sand can now slow down enemies, making it easier to escape combat.

Grants the "Mutiny" power. At will, activates the curse of the Death's Emperor, causing whoever is in possession of the coin to attack randomly for 30 seconds. Any deaths resulting from this can't be traced back to you.
A cursed septim appears in your inventory. When someone else is in possession of the coin, your attacks deal 25% more damage and critical damage to them.
Petty crimes are slowly forgotten, allowing your bounties for non-violent crimes to decay at a rate of 50% of your Pickpocket skill level each day.

treeDescription: Evasion is the art to evade enemy blows and allows a character to defend efficiently if he wears only light or even no armor.

description.base: After some training you are now much more confident in your evasive movements.
description.subtext: [25% less falling damage when wearing no heavy armor, unique bonus when wearing high-quality materials, -50% armor weight penalty]

description.base: Up to 12% more power attack and ranged weapon damage when wearing no heavy armor.
description.subtext: 25% more armor rating when wearing a low-tier light chestpiece (fur, hide, leather, etc) and no heavy armor.

description.base: You've gained the ability to act faster in combat, though doing so will quickly exhaust you.
description.subtext: [Lesser power: Slow time by 50% for 10 seconds, drains 15 stamina per second]

description.base: Your reflexes are lightning fast.
description.subtext: [50% chance avoid physical damage when wearing no heavy armor: head, chest, hands, feet]

description.base: You can balance your weapon and have unlocked dynamic bow dodging.
description.subtext: [Up to 24% less power attack cost when wearing no heavy armor, press RMB when drawing a light bow to dodge, release left click to fire]

description.base: Your light armor and clothes have become your second skin.
description.subtext: [Up to +10% movement speed when wearing no heavy armor: head, chest, hands, feet, -25% armor weight penalty]

description.base: You have learned to flank your enemies with ease.
description.subtext: [25% bonus damage when attacking from behind]

description.base: Your trained reflexes allow you to dodge incoming blows.
description.subtext: [Unlocks ability to dodge. Left alt by default.]

description.base: You learned how to avoid the limitations light armors bestow upon somatic spell components.
description.subtext: [No spell cost penalty for casting spells in light armor]

description.base: Having no weight on your body grants you extreme precision and reflexes.
description.subtext: [20% chance to avoid physical damage, +5% movement speed and +10% armor penetration when not wearing armor]

description.base: You are more agile and can recover from exhaustion faster.
description.subtext: [+5% movement speed and +25% stamina regeneration when not wearing heavy armor]

description.base: You are more agile and can recover from exhaustion faster.
description.subtext: [+10% movement speed and +50% stamina regeneration when not wearing heavy armor]

description.base: You take 10% less attack damage from enemies with full Health if not wearing heavy armor
You take 20% less attack damage from enemies with full Health if not wearing heavy armor
If not wearing heavy armor, jump in combat to cause all incoming attacks and spells to miss for 1 second. This effect has a 10 second cooldown.
While sprinting in Light Armor or while Unarmored, you cannot be staggered and take 50% less damage from power attacks.

treeDescription: Heavy armor reflects a warrior's talent in wearing heavy armor and fighting in it.

description.base: You've accustomed yourself to using heavy armor.
description.subtext: [No stamina drain for wearing heavy armor, unique bonus when wearing high-quality materials, -35% armor weight penalty]

description.base: You are able to keep concentrated enough in heavy armor.
description.subtext: [No spell cost penalty for casting Novice and Apprentice spells in heavy armor]

description.base: Your heavy armor distracts you even less.
description.subtext: [No spell cost penalty for casting Adept spells in heavy armor]

description.base: You're accustomed to your heavy armor so much that you can now cast even sophisticated spells with relative ease.
description.subtext: [No spell cost penalty for casting Expert spells in heavy armor]

description.base: You have mastered spellcasting while wearing heavy armor.
description.subtext: [No spell cost penalty for casting Master spells in heavy armor, 15% less spell cost when wearing all heavy armor: head, chest, hands, feet]

description.base: You are less hindered by your armor and can attack with ease.
description.subtext: [No power attack stamina cost penalty, increased unarmed damage with heavy gauntlets, -10% armor weight penalty]

description.base: Your training made you stronger and you are now less burdened by the rigidity of your armor.
description.subtext: [+40 stamina, +20 carry weight, -10% armor weight penalty]

description.base: Taking hits gives you a rush of adrenaline.
description.subtext: [Restore 15 stamina over 6 seconds after taking a hit, -10% armor weight penalty]

description.base: You've reached perfection in the skill of wearing heavy armor and are now significantly more maneuverable in it.
description.subtext: [15% less armor weight, 10% more armor rating, 50% less poise damage when wearing all heavy armor: head, chest, hands, feet]

description.base: After extensive training you now can sprint in heavy armor without problems.
description.subtext: [no sprinting stamina cost penalty, take 80% less melee damage when bullrushing, -10% armor weight penalty]

description.base: When in full heavy armor, you can cause devastating impact when bull-rushing.
description.subtext: [Bull-rush while wearing 4 or more pieces of heavy armor does double damage and has higher chance to knockdown]

description.base: When in full heavy armor, you can pose a defensive stance to reduce incoming impact.
description.subtext: [Resist physical, elemental and poise damage by 33% while attacking, casting, walking or standing still wearing 4 or more pieces of heavy armor]

description.base: You can deal more damage with melee weapons while mounted. [Requires Level 10]
description.subtext: [1.5x melee attack damage while on horseback]

description.base: You take half damage from falling if wearing all Heavy Armor.
You are trained to deflect incoming attacks while wearing all Heavy Armor. Whenever an enemy attacks you, you gain 15 points of armor rating for 10 seconds. This effect stacks.
If wearing all Heavy Armor, take 30% less attack damage from power attacks.
When struck by a power attack or power bash, your attacks deal 50% more damage to the attacker for 5 seconds if wearing all Heavy Armor.

treeDescription: Blocking reflects a warrior's skill in parrying and deflecting blows and his aptitude with a shield.

description.base: You strengthened your shield arm and trained to parry blows a little.
description.subtext: [Block 25% more damage with weapons and shields, take 25% less elemental damage when blocking with a shield and 10% less with a weapon]

description.base: You hold on to your shield like you would hold on to your life.
description.subtext: [50% less shield weight, 25% more armor rating, block 40% more damage, arrows that hit the shield do no damage]

description.base: You've learned how to block damaging spells more efficiently.
description.subtext: [Take 50% less fire, frost, and shock damage when blocking with a shield]

description.base: You have honed your defensive movements to perfection.
description.subtext: [Blocking with a shield does not slow you down, 75% less shield weight, 50% more armor rating]

description.base: When bull rushing with your shield raised, you are a tremendous force to deal with.
description.subtext: [Sprinting with a shield raised knocks down most targets and reduces incoming damage by 50%]

description.base: By gathering your strength for a short while, you can perform a much more powerful bash.
description.subtext: [Able to do a power bash]

description.base: When you put all of your power into your shield bashes, you will often overpower your foes.
description.subtext: [Power bashing with a shield can knock down]

description.base: You've trained in the art of disarming foes mid-combat.
description.subtext: [20% chance to disarm when power bashing using a shield or weapon]

description.base: With weapon or shield you can block almost any blow with rock-solid confidence.
description.subtext: [Block 50% more damage, recover some stamina when blocking a hit]

description.base: You can use your shield more offensively, using it as a deadly weapon.
description.subtext: [50% more shield bash damage, double damage when not wearing heavy armor, 25% less shield bash stamina cost]

description.base: You can use your shield more offensively, using it as a deadly weapon.
description.subtext: [100% more shield bash damage, double damage when not wearing heavy armor, 50% less shield bash stamina cost]

description.base: You can use your torch more effectively in combat, causing painful burns.
description.subtext: [Power bash with a torch does 10 extra fire damage and staggers the target, targets set on fire take 5 extra fire damage from weapon attacks]

description.base: You have rejected mastering one specific weapon type. Instead, you use have begun to master versatility.
description.subtext: [15% more damage]

description.base: You have rejected mastering one specific weapon type. Instead, you use have begun to master versatility.
description.subtext: [30% more damage]

description.base: Your power attacks are now devastating enough to penetrate enemy armor and less exhausting.
description.subtext: [-30% power attack stamina cost, +30% armor penetration]

description.base: Like the Imperial Legions of old, you understand the advantage of shortswords in combat.
description.subtext: [20% more bash damage, 20% more block and 20% less poise damage when wielding a shortsword]

treeDescription: Archery governs the use of bows and crossbows. The greater the skill, the more deadly the shot.

description.base: After some training at the shooting range you can deal more damage with ranged weapons.
description.subtext: [20% more damage, ammunition grants armor penetration]

description.base: By concentrating only on your target and holding your breath, you can now aim much more precisely.
description.subtext: [Zoom in by holding right mouse button]

description.base: When fully focusing on your target, everything around you seems to slow down remarkably.
description.subtext: [Time slows down while zooming, +10% critical hit chance]

description.base: You have learned to draw and fire in one single movement.
description.subtext: [+50% draw speed with heavy bows, +100% with light bows]

description.base: Your have familiarized yourself with the mechanics of your crossbow.
description.subtext: [+50% reload speed with heavy crossbows, +100% with light crossbows]

description.base: You have discovered the art of aiming at tendons and joints.
description.subtext: [Bows do 100% more poise damage, move forward and hold bash to perform power shot when over 200 stamina]

description.base: Any successful staggering shot will almost always stun the target momentarily.
description.subtext: [Staggering hits will also stun the target]

description.base: Your aim is now precise enough to target weak spots in the enemy's defenses.
description.subtext: [20% more damage]

description.base: You've learned how to hit the weakest parts of armor.
description.subtext: [+50% armor penetration from ammunition]

description.base: You've mastered the technique of hitting weak armor parts.
description.subtext: [+50% armor penetration from ammunition]

description.base: You improved your footwork when engaging in ranged combat with light weapons.
description.subtext: [Able to run with a drawn light bow or crossbow]

description.base: You can keep steady aim with heavy ranged weapons, dealing more damage with sneak attacks.
description.subtext: [1.5x irresistible sneak attack damage with heavy bow or crossbow]

description.base: Throwing knives penetrate the flesh, interrupting the target.
description.subtext: [25% chance to stagger targets with throwing knives]

description.base: You can throw knives more precisely.
description.subtext: [50% more damage with throwing knives]

description.base: You are more adapted to the wildlife, and better understand its inhabitants. [Requires Level 10]
description.subtext: [Do 20% more damage to animals and take 10% less damage from animals, +10% poison and disease resistance]

description.base: You are more adapted to the wildlife, and better understand its inhabitants. [Requires Level 20]
description.subtext: [Do 40% more damage to animals and take 20% less damage from animals, +20% poison and disease resistance]

description.base: You can use your bow or crossbow as a melee weapon in close combat.
description.subtext: [Double damage with bow bash, bow bash staggers targets, 50% less bow bash stamina cost]

description.base: Cannot be staggered while holding a drawn bow or reloading a crossbow.

Shooting a target beyond 25 feet three times in rapid succession, leaving less than 2.75 seconds between each hit, deals bonus damage equal to 15% of the target's current Health (max. 150 damage) and knocks the target to the ground.

Grants the Lion's Arrow power: Store your currently dual-cast spell. When you shoot a fully drawn bow in combat, the stored spell is released at 20% strength toward the crosshair, costing 50 Magicka. Only works with spells that target others.

treeDescription: The art of combat using two-handed weapons, such as greatswords, battle axes, and warhammers.

description.base: Your improved fighting techniques increase your damage dealt with two-handed weapons.
description.subtext: [20% more damage]

description.base: Your improved fighting techniques increase your damage dealt with two-handed weapons even more.
description.subtext: [40% more damage]

description.base: Your power attacks become mighty blows that will penetrate armor and are less tiring.
description.subtext: [-30% power attack stamina cost, +30% armor penetration]

description.base: Your two-handed combat style has improved so much that all power attacks have become devastating.
description.subtext: [25% more power attack damage, +10% critical hit chance]

description.base: Your power attacks are almost unstoppable.
description.subtext: [Take 75% less poise damage while power attacking with two-handed weapons.]

description.base: You can fell almost any foe with a single strike of your two-hander.
description.subtext: [50% more poise damage]

description.base: Your barbaric instincts strengthen as you or your foe meet their end.
description.subtext: [Your power attacks deal up to 100% more damage based on the difference between your health and your target's health]

description.base: You've learned to perform a leaping power attack while sprinting, reducing your enemies to smithereens.
description.subtext: [Able to do sprinting power attack which has a 50% chance to critical hit]

description.base: You've become familiar with battle axes and halberds.
description.subtext: [Attacks deal 40 extra damage over 20 seconds, +10% armor penetration]

description.base: become an advanced battle axe and halberd fighter.
description.subtext: [Attacks deal 60 extra damage over 20 seconds, +20% armor penetration]

description.base: You've become a master of battle axe and halberd combat.
description.subtext: [Attacks deal 80 extra damage over 20 seconds, +30% armor penetration]

description.base: You've acquired the advanced techniques of using greatswords and pikes.
description.subtext: [Attacks reduce target's melee damage by 10% for 10 seconds, +10% critical hit chance]

description.base: You've acquired the advanced techniques of using greatswords and pikes.
description.subtext: [Attacks reduce target's melee damage by 15% for 10 seconds, +20% critical hit chance]

description.base: You've become a master of using greatswords and pikes.
description.subtext: [Attacks reduce target's melee damage by 20% for 10 seconds, +30% critical hit chance]

description.base: You've learned some techniques to crush armor with warhammers.
description.subtext: [+15% armor penetration, +5% critical hit chance]

description.base: You've learned some techniques to crush armor with warhammers.
description.subtext: [+30% armor penetration, +10% critical hit chance]

description.base: You've learned some techniques to crush armor with warhammers.
description.subtext: [+45% armor penetration, +15% critical hit chance]

description.base: You've learned the basics of quarterstaff combat.
description.subtext: [Deal 10 stamina damage on-hit, +5% critical hit chance]

description.base: You've acquired the advanced techniques of quarterstaff combat.
description.subtext: [Deal 15 stamina damage on-hit, +10% critical hit chance]

description.base: You've become a master of quarterstaff combat.
description.subtext: [Deal 20 stamina damage on-hit, +15% critical hit chance]

description.base: With enough momentum, you can slash deeper into targets with power attacks.
description.subtext: [+25% critical hit chance and 2x critical hit damage when power attacking]

description.base: You can deliver maximum force with your warhammer to knock off targets that fail to resist.
description.subtext: [power attacks with warhammers knock off targets by 10% chance, 25% more damage against staggered targets.]

description.base: Your mighty swings can cleave through target's defense, hindering them from blocking next attacks.
description.subtext: [power attacks reduce target's blockable damage by 90% and stamina regeneration by 25% for 10 seconds]

description.base: You take half damage from enemy attacks while power attacking or blocking with quarterstaves and battlestaves.
Standing power attacks with battleaxes and halberds execute targets below 25% Health, delivering a critical strike that deals twenty times critical damage.
You can more efficiently block and parry incoming attacks with quarterstaves.
description.subtext: [quarterstaves block 50% better, and bashes do twice the damage]

description.base: Whenever a standing power attack with a warhammer inflicts a critical strike, it deals 3% more critical damage per point of Stamina.
Two-handed power attacks with greatswords and pikes deal up to 100% more damage below half Health. The damage bonus increases as your Health decreases.

treeDescription: The skill to use light weaponry, among which are daggers, swords, axes and maces.

description.base: Your improved fighting techniques allow you to swing one-handed weapons or fists with less effort and deal more damage.
description.subtext: [20% more damage]

description.base: Your improved fighting techniques increase your damage dealt with one-handed weapons or fists greatly.
description.subtext: [40% more damage]

description.base: Your power attacks with one-handed weapons or fists are now devastating enough to penetrate enemy armor and less exhausting.
description.subtext: [-30% power attack stamina cost, +30% armor penetration]

description.base: You know how to put the maximum force into your power attacks.
description.subtext: [20% more power attack damage, +10% critical hit chance]

description.base: While attacking a target, build up momentum for a decisive strike.
description.subtext: [Each normal attack with one-handed weapons increases power attack damage on target by 10% for 5s. Stacks up to six times (three while dual-wielding).]

description.base: You have learned to perform a leaping power attack while sprinting.
description.subtext: [Able to do sprinting power attack which has a 50% critical hit chance]

description.base: You've become familiar with war axes.
description.subtext: [Attacks deal 20 extra damage over 20 seconds, +10% armor penetration]

description.base: You've become an advanced war axe fighter.
description.subtext: [Attacks deal 30 extra damage over 20 seconds, +20% armor penetration]

description.base: You've become a master of war axe combat.
description.subtext: [Attacks deal 40 extra damage over 20 seconds, +30% armor penetration]

description.base: You've learned some techniques to crush armor with maces.
description.subtext: [10% more power attack damage, +15% armor penetration]

description.base: You've become an advanced mace fighter and know how to find weak spots in enemy armor.
description.subtext: [20% more power attack damage, +30% armor penetration]

description.base: You've become a masterly mace fighter, rendering armor almost useless.
description.subtext: [30% more power attack damage, +45% armor penetration]

description.base: You've learned the basics of using 1 handed swords, spears, javelins, rapiers and katanas.
description.subtext: [Attacks reduce target's melee damage by 10% for 10 seconds, +10% critical hit chance]

description.base: You've acquired the advanced techniques of using 1 handed swords and spears.
description.subtext: [Attacks reduce target's melee damage by 15% for 10 seconds, +20% critical hit chance]

description.base: You've become a master of using 1 handed swords and spears.
description.subtext: [Attacks reduce target's melee damage by 20% for 10 seconds, +30% critical hit chance]

description.base: When fighting with dual or single one-handed weapons or fists, you are able to hit enemy weak points better.
description.subtext: [+15% critical hit chance]

description.base: When fighting with dual or single one-handed weapons or fists, you're able to hit enemy weak points even better.
description.subtext: [+30% critical hit chance]

description.base: You've mastered the art of using multiple weapons in combat.
description.subtext: [50% more dual-wield power attack poise damage with any weapon, unlocks secondary dagger abilities when using a bow]

description.base: You are trained in hand to hand combat, and can effectively disable opponents with bare hands.
description.subtext: [+25 unarmed damage, unarmed attacks damage target stamina by half the unarmed damage]

description.base: You learned some dirty tricks for your dagger or tanto.
description.subtext: [2x irresistible sneak attack damage, +20% damage from behind, +5% critical hit chance]

description.base: A dagger or tanto in your hand turns into a deadly weapon.
description.subtext: [3x irresistible sneak attack damage, +30% damage from behind, +10% critical hit chance]

description.base: You have mastered the deadly art of daggers and tantos.
description.subtext: [4x irresistible sneak attack damage, +40% damage from behind, +15% critical hit chance]

description.base: Your masterful strikes allow you to disarm enemies while attacking.
description.subtext: [power attacks with swords, spears, javelins, rapiers and katanas disarm attacking targets by 15% chance]

description.base: You can cause stunning impact to targets that fail to block, knocking them down to the ground.
description.subtext: [unblocked power attacks with maces knock down targets by 10% chance, 25% more damage against staggered targets]

description.base: The blade of your war axe can carve into target's weapons and shields, weakening their damage and protection.
description.subtext: [power attacks with war axes reduce target's blockable damage by 80% and stamina regeneration by 25% for 10 seconds]

description.base: You can aim for critical weak points, dealing even more damage.
description.subtext: [2x critical damage and +25% critical hit chance]

description.base: You can grapple opponents to disarm or immobilize them.
description.subtext: [unarmed power attacks stagger targets by 50% chance and disarm by 10% chance]

description.base: You can knock down enemies by grappling.
description.subtext: [unarmed power attacks knock down targets by 10% chance]

description.base: You can defend yourself better even without weapons or shields.
description.subtext: [15% less physical damage taken for each hand empty]

description.base: While unarmed, you can maneuver more freely and resist physical force.
description.subtext: [+5% movement speed for each hand empty, +50 mass when both hands are empty]

description.base: You can balance your weapon better when wielding it in a single hand, delivering quick and precise attacks.
description.subtext: [+25% damage against enemies who are attacking and +15% armor penetration when left hand is empty]

description.base: You can balance your weapon well with single hand, and can use it to cast magic.
description.subtext: [+25% poise damage and 10% less spell cost when left hand is empty or wielding magic]

description.base: Power attacks deal up to 100% more damage below half Health. The damage bonus increases as your Health decreases.
Whenever a standing power attack with a mace inflicts a critical strike, it deals 3% more critical damage per point of Stamina.
Standing power attacks with war axes execute targets below 25% Health, delivering a critical strike that deals twenty times critical damage.
Forward power attacks with a dagger ignore 25% of armor.
